statements: DELETE FROM billing_invoicing WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM billing_invoicing WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM billing_invoicing WHERE usage_amount > 1000 AND billing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM billing_invoicing WHERE service_provided LIKE '%internet%'
DELETE FROM Billing WHERE customer_id = 100 AND service_type = 'Internet';
DELETE FROM Billing WHERE bill_id IN (SELECT bill_id FROM Invoice WHERE payment_status = 'UNPAID');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001 AND address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM services WHERE service_name = 'Maintenance Service';
DELETE FROM services WHERE service_id IN (SELECT service_id FROM usage_records WHERE usage_hours > 100);
DELETE FROM usage_records WHERE customer_id = 123 AND service_id = 456;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 789 AND invoice_date < '2022-01-01';
